Name: Witchinour
About the game: Witchinour is a roguelite twin stick shooter focused on fast, 60fps action and constantly increasing difficulty. You play as an explorer who comes across a dungeon that an apprentice witch named Nour found herself lost in years ago on a full moon... Witchinour has: 7 increasingly dangerous areas to fight (and loop) your way through 6 class abilities, 5 spells, 21 weapons, and 40 upgrades to help you descend the dungeon 1 dynamic difficulty system that wants you dead 6 levels of stacking difficulty modifiers to unlock to push your skills to the limit
